title: Extended Pattern Schema
description: A schema for enriched patterns using information mapping and pattern language theory.

context.description: The context or background for the pattern.

problem.description: The core problem the pattern addresses.

solution.description: The proposed solution to the problem.

example.description: An example that illustrates the pattern in use.

rationale.description: The reasoning behind why the solution works.

warning.description: Any caution or warning about applying this pattern.

type.description: A classification of the pattern type based on its domain or function.

cluster.description: Cluster ID assigned during semantic grouping.
